column5: The 'Rocking M Ranch' (RMR). The property is a large, rambling duplex conveniently located less than one hour from Austin and less than two hours from Houston and San Antonio. The 'Lone Star', the largest of the two homes, is the rental and offers visitors ample privacy with sole use of the pool area. The owner occupies the smaller second home. Though new to Airbnb, RMR has been a successful rental since 2012. For property reviews, visit We are... 'Real Country, Real Close'!
